description:
Keep your head from chilling out on your cold weather rides and runs. Slim enough to tuck under a helmet, yet warm enough to make a difference, the Califaction beanie is like a winter jersey for your head.

  • Soft nylon blend wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • Flat lock seams lay comfortably under your helmet
  • Dropped ear band offers extra coverage where you need it most
name: MEC Calefaction Beanie - Unisex
